title: Fringe Encounter:  Michael Martin & GrimGriz
description:
In this Fringe Encounter, GrimGriz and Michael Martin discuss biodynamic farming and starting out in a back yard, and touch on music, presence and LaMDA.


https://www.thecenterforsophiologicalstudies.com/books

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/2bZtrzTYza
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
